summary: CAR IS A LEMON RECALL REPAIR WAS DONE IN JUNE 2016 FOR RECALL NUMBER 15S18. I PURCHASE THE CAR IN NOV 2016. AND HAVE LOST STEERING POWER TO VEHICLE TOOK IT TO FORD DEALER THEY SAID IT WAS PAST THE MILAGE AND COULD NOT BE COVERED WANT TO CHARGE ME 1500 TO FIX SOMETHING THAT WAS REPAIRED DUE TO RECALL CALL FORD CORP. THEY SAID SAME THING.
